# EventAdapter.Handler method

Event handler adapter which calls the original event in the specified thread context.

```csharp
public void Handler(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs args)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sender | Object which raised the event. |
| args | Event details. |
